Text: I downloaded this torrent, and all was good with that, but it doesn't explain properly what exactly I am meant to be extracting with WinRAR, there are tons of WinRAR files in the GAME folder. Any help would be appreciated

@Chekzz you gotta extract one of the winrar files, it doesn't matter wich one (i did the first file) and then you'll see the mds/mdf files. you gotta extract those files to for example your desktop. then you mount one of these files with poweriso or daemon tools.
